moves.name: Fire Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Ice Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with an icy fist. It may also leave the target frozen.

moves.name: Thunder Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Gravity
moves.description: Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and negating Levitate.

moves.name: Bind
moves.description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Night Shade
moves.description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user's level.

moves.name: Disable
moves.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

moves.name: Disable
moves.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

moves.name: Foresight
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Shadow Sneak
moves.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

moves.name: Will-O-Wisp
moves.description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

moves.name: Shadow Punch
moves.description: The user throws a punch from the shadows. The punch lands without fail.

moves.name: Hex
moves.description: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems.

moves.name: Mean Look
moves.description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

moves.name: Payback
moves.description: If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

moves.name: Future Sight
moves.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.
